mapper.insert: insert into tbl_review(review_title, product_id, meterial_id, review_writer, review_write_date, review_contents, review_image) values(#{review_title}, #{product_id}, #{meterial_id}, #{review_writer}, #{review_contents}, #{review_image})
mapper.update: update tbl_review set review_click=review_click+1 where review_number=#{review_number}
update tbl_review set review_contents=#{review_contents}, review_image=#{review_image}, review_modify_date=now() where review_number=#{review_number}
